name.baseName: Installation ; Wind turbine (The categories of wind turbine : 27×3.6MW+1×5MW)
安装 ; 风轮机（风轮机的类别: 27×3.6MW+1×5MW）

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The wind turbines referenced by this data set, graded at 27x3.6MW and 1x5MW, are designed for large-scale production of renewable electricity within offshore wind farms. Specifically, the Donghai Bridge Offshore Wind Farm (DBOWF) installation is a pioneering offshore energy project in China, located near Shanghai. These turbines are integral components for sustainable energy generation and contribute to on-grid electricity provision.
此数据集中提及的风轮机，分级为27x3.6MW和1x5MW，旨在海上风电场内进行大规模的可再生电力生产。具体而言，东海大桥海上风电场（DBOWF）安装项目是中国上海附近的海上能源先导项目。这些风轮机是可持续能源生成的关键组成部分，并为电网供电提供贡献。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit is 1 kWh on-grid electricity provision.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The studied wind farm, the Donghai Bridge Offshore Wind Farm (DBOWF), is China's first offshore wind farm within the jurisdiction of Shanghai, as well as the first offshore wind farm outside Europe. The project has two-phases of construction, located on each side of the Donghai bridge (Fig. 1).
所研究的风电场- -东海大桥海上风电场( DBOWF )是中国在上海管辖范围内的第一个海上风电场，也是欧洲以外的第一个海上风电场。工程分两期施工，分别位于东海大桥两侧(图1 )。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The wind turbines referenced by this data set, graded at 27x3.6MW and 1x5MW, are designed for large-scale production of renewable electricity within offshore wind farms. Specifically, the Donghai Bridge Offshore Wind Farm (DBOWF) installation is a pioneering offshore energy project in China, located near Shanghai. These turbines are integral components for sustainable energy generation and contribute to on-grid electricity provision.
此数据集中提及的风轮机，分级为27x3.6MW和1x5MW，旨在海上风电场内进行大规模的可再生电力生产。具体而言，东海大桥海上风电场（DBOWF）安装项目是中国上海附近的海上能源先导项目。这些风轮机是可持续能源生成的关键组成部分，并为电网供电提供贡献。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: The present study employed the PLCA modeling approach to calculate the energy and environmental emissions of a typical offshore wind farm in China. The cradle-to-grave process includes four stages, materials and equipment manufacturing, transportation and installation, operation and maintenance, and dismantling and recycling (Fig. 2).
本研究采用PLCA建模方法计算了中国某典型海上风电场的能源和环境排放。从摇篮到坟墓的过程包括材料和设备制造、运输和安装、操作和维护、拆解和回收4个阶段(图2 )。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The technical parameters of wind turbines, foundations and cables are obtained from the design documents of the DBOWF (Table 2). For key materials and equipment, their sea transportation energy is calculated from the transportation load and shipping energy intensity. The facility installation energy and emissions were estimated based on the construction plan. The wind farm's operation and maintenance data, such as the frequency and working time of maintenance, were obtained from site investigations with engineers and technicians. The uncertainties associated with model parameters and input data are illustrated in the sensitivity analysis section of this paper.
风机、基础和电缆的技术参数从DBOWF的设计文件中获得(表2)。对于关键材料和设备，其海上运输能量由运输负荷和海运能量强度计算得到。根据施工方案，对设施安装能耗和排放进行了估算。风电场的运行和维护数据，如维护的频率和工作时间，是通过与工程技术人员的现场调查获得的。与模型参数和输入数据相关的不确定性在本文的敏感性分析部分进行了说明。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Yang, J. et al. The life-cycle energy and environmental emissions of a typical offshore wind farm in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 180, 316–324 (2018).
Yang, J. et al. The life-cycle energy and environmental emissions of a typical offshore wind farm in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 180, 316–324 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this data set should note that the information is specific to the DBOWF and may not be completely generalizable to all offshore wind farms. When using this data for lifecycle assessment, ensure to include all stages described in the cradle-to-grave process: manufacturing, transportation and installation, operation and maintenance, and dismantling and recycling. Pay particular attention to the specific energy and emission estimates provided for the facility installation based on the construction plan, and the operation and maintenance data obtained from site investigations. Always account for the uncertainties described in the sensitivity analysis when interpreting results.
此数据集的用户应注意，信息特定于DBOWF，并可能不完全适用于所有海上风电场。在使用此数据进行生命周期评估时，确保包括从摇篮到坟墓过程中描述的所有阶段：制造、运输与安装、操作与维护以及拆卸与回收。特别关注根据施工计划提供的设施安装的具体能源和排放估算，以及从现场调查中获得的运行和维护数据。在解释结果时，总是要考虑到敏感性分析中描述的不确定性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 27 3.6-MW wind turbines and one 5-MW prototype wind turbine.
27 3.6-MW wind turbines and one 5-MW prototype wind turbine.
